text: Motion

One, two, three, four!
One, two, three, four!
Motion

Mano, just now.
I need to talk to you about something...

Ah, yeah...
What is it, Hiori-chan...?
...Is there something wrong?

Ah... um, it's nothing. Well, I'm just
glad you called me by my first name...

R-Right...
You should get used to it.

Ehehe, I get what you mean!
It feels like we're getting closer!

Even you meguru...
I'm going to be weirdly self-concious of it...!

Sorry, Hiori-chan...
Well, that's what happened earlier...

Yeah... Mano is the center here, so I
thought I'd ask how you want it to look.

As the center...
Well... I tend to move slowly...

So i want to make broader movements...
Like a bird flapping its wings in the sky...

Oh, my gosh! I like that idea!
Then let's make it sound all basaaa and gwahh!

Basaa and gwah...?
Sorry, can you tell me more...?

Yeah! So... basaaa in the image of a bird!
Gwahh in a cheerful way! That's it!

Fufu..
Yeah, let's try Meguru-chan's image too...

Yeah, let's do it!  I could get more and more
ideas when I'm with the two of you!

When I look at you two... 
It makes me want to work harder.

Yeah...
Let's keep up the good work... together.
